price: Reci: "Pa donesite vi od Allaha knjigu koja bolje, nego ove dvije, na Pravi put upućuje, nju bih slijedio, ako ste iz reda onih koji istinu govore!"
arabic: قُلۡ فَأۡتُواْ بِكِتَٰبٖ مِّنۡ عِندِ ٱللَّهِ هُوَ أَهۡدَىٰ مِنۡهُمَآ أَتَّبِعۡهُ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰدِقِينَ

version.title: Bosnian Translation - Muhammad Mihanovich
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Muhammad Mihanovich, printed in 2013. some referred verses corrected by Supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation, and development.

meta.transliteration: qul fatū bikitābin min ʿindi al-lahi huwa ahdā min'humā attabiʿ'hu in kuntum ṣādiqīna
